title: Keeler Batting SGC 40 - Looking to downgrade to same
author: asphaltman

posts.post_title: Keeler Batting SGC 40 - Looking to downgrade to same
posts.post_content:
Would like to see if anyone with a lower grade example that may want a bump up to a SGC 40 would be interested in working out a deal.  I don't want a complete beater....but a presentable 1 or a 2 in exchange for this and another low grade HOF to even out the score....let me know if you have something of interest.  
*** not looking to sell. 

[url=https://ibb.co/mzstNgm][img]https://i.ibb.co/HgvYh30/1909-11-T206-Keeler-Bat-F.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://ibb.co/WpvTtk9][img]https://i.ibb.co/Nn24S9h/1909-11-T206-Keeler-Bat-B.jpg[/img][/url]
figured one more bump...looking for this card in lower grade
